artist: Artist: Alfred Jarry; Author: Music by Claude Terrasse; Author: Lyrics by Alfred Jarry; Publisher: Edition du Mercure de France, Paris , for the Repertoire des Pantins
creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: Illustrated album of music by Claude Terrasse for the Repertoire des Pantins (Theatre des Pantins), a puppet theater founded in Paris in 1898 by Alfred Jarry, Franc-Nohain, and Claude Terrasse; 8 pp.
provenance: Ruth and Bruce Dayton, Wayzata, Minn.; given to MIA, 1991.
title: The Debraining Song
